text:
"The Hand That Rocks the Cradle" is a 1992 American thriller movie. It is about a psychopathic nanny who wants to take over the family of another woman. Rebecca De Mornay plays Mrs Mott. Julianne Moore plays Marlene Craven. Annabella Sciorra plays Claire.
"The Hand That Rocks the Cradle" opened in January 1992. This movie got positive reviews. Its box office was also positive.
